## Summary
Implement file viewing capability allowing boxes to display file contents. This adds vim-style `:file` and `:reload` commands for loading files into boxes, with full support for focus mode viewing including line numbers and scrolling.

Fixes #55

This is Phase 2 of #19 (File/process association with popup output)

## Changes
- Add `file_viewer.h/c` with file loading, reload, and clear functions
- Add `CommandLine` state to Canvas for vim-style command input
- Handle `:` key to enter command mode with cursor editing
- Render command line at bottom of screen with hints
- Support Windows (CRLF) and Unix (LF) line endings
- Add 43 comprehensive test assertions for file viewer

## New Commands
- `:file <path>` - Load file into selected box (sets content_type to FILE)
- `:reload` - Reload file content for file-type boxes
